top10_tweets_like:
updated book draft "computational #genomics with R"  

https://t.co/L4buuGIAXg.  

Includes #Rstats ,#Chipseq, #MachineLearning, #Statistics, #multiomics, #BSseq and #rnaseq chapters. https://t.co/3vxe3YgtyR

Talk all you want about the usefulness of 3D plots, but I think it's a net positive that you can visualize bending spacetime entirely in #rstats ðŸ˜‰

(I realized I never shared this visualization I made with #rayshader + #rayrender from last year's rstudioconf on Twitter) https://t.co/HSC1Ee9rIY

I'm beyond excited for this preview release of the @rstudio IDE - real time swapping between plain text/markdown + #RStats  and formatted text!

Oh... and also:
- #Python objects/dataframes in environment pane
- Multiple source columns
- Command palette
- Rainbow Parentheses https://t.co/KCNunL27zE

Another {gt} table for this week's #TidyTuesday, showing information about the @Beyonce and @taylorswift13 albums in the style of a top chart

code: https://t.co/gerPq6MvdI

#RStats #dataviz #TidyTuesdayTable https://t.co/QcyWoGuroV
I have been loving the new visual editor and recommend all R Markdown lovers to give it a try! I CANNOT wait till I get to teach new #rstats learners with this interface. https://t.co/tROf1pnlib

Multiple source columns - work on #rstats scripts side-by-side!

(Note you can set as many columns as you like!) https://t.co/w8KPaCHIN3

So you always wanted to use @hadleywickham's #tidyr with @ApacheSpark in #rstats, right? Well, with #sparklyr 1.4, now you can!

This release also enables #GPU accelerated data frames in Spark with @rapidsai and many other improvements: https://t.co/REJs1Eq8yH https://t.co/jcjfBqsZ6h

https://t.co/7hojQxu4HE https://t.co/9CImfNmGrd

I've had an amazing #rstats & #datascience workshop with Dr. @allison_horst to kick of the PhD experience. Biggest take-aways: 1. Build reproducibility in every aspect of your workflow. 2. #Coding is for everyone, not just the privileged few. Share and help others learn.
